msg.msgText:
A "LTPAProfile" composite object can be created by using the "create" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver create LTPAProfile help imaserver create LTPAProfile "Name=value" "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver create LTPAProfile "Name=LtpaProfile" "KeyFileName=LtpaKey" "Password=password" Configuration items for "LTPAProfile" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
